channel.title: Comments on: Michael Joseph Scott – Born 29 July 2009

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/07/30/michael-joseph-scott-born-29-july-2009/#comment-2984">maya</a>.
The girls are thrilled to have a baby brother. Biggest challenge is reminding them to be gentle :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to maya.

The girls are thrilled to have a baby brother. Biggest challenge is reminding them to be gentle ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: maya
item.dc:creator: maya
item.description: ooo's and aaa's all around! The older sisters are going to have a ball taking care of their little bro.
item.content:encoded: ooo’s and aaa’s all around! The older sisters are going to have a ball taking care of their little bro.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/07/30/michael-joseph-scott-born-29-july-2009/#comment-2982">Vera</a>.
Bill took a lot of pictures, I'll be putting some of those up on my Flickr account.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Vera.

Bill took a lot of pictures, I’ll be putting some of those up on my Flickr account.

item.title: By: Vera
item.dc:creator: Vera
item.description: so excited for a Scott Family boy...and he has dark hair like i did...yay! gonna need a haircut in a month though :) can't wait to see more pictures!!!!
item.content:encoded: so excited for a Scott Family boy…and he has dark hair like i did…yay! gonna need a haircut in a month though ðŸ™‚ can’t wait to see more pictures!!!!

item.title: By: Michael Moncur
item.dc:creator: Michael Moncur
item.description:
Congratulations Joseph & Family!
Michael is a great name. :)
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations Joseph & Family!

Michael is a great name. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Elizabeth Scott
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Scott
item.description: Hi baby Michael!!!! Remember that Auntie Beef is the coolest ever!
item.content:encoded: Hi baby Michael!!!! Remember that Auntie Beef is the coolest ever!

item.title: By: Laura Moncur
item.dc:creator: Laura Moncur
item.description:
Congratulations! I bet you're so proud!
I guess we won't be seeing you for a while and for SUCH a good reason!
Sending all the good karma your way!
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations! I bet you’re so proud!

I guess we won’t be seeing you for a while and for SUCH a good reason!

Sending all the good karma your way!
